messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: If you or a loved one has developed psykic powers, please let me know! I'll promote you right away for this wonderful tallent

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We are forming Militia, contact the Captain if you are interested in joining

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard Borealum. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Borealum is no longer part of Nanotrasen, We are a sepperate, self governing station now, REJOICE!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Brig Control.
